Articles.Content: So on a whim I just made this, a replacement for the default user silhouette icon. Dunno if that's even possible to replace by default, but if anyone wants to use it themselves, go nuts. It's 6 am and I felt like making something, demmit

Oh that's awesome, thanks Nova! I'll figure out how to replace the original

 

edit:
Done! Thank again, that gives a nice touch.
My two cents is I'd rather see nothing if a user hasn't set an avatar. It looks a bit odd seeing those generic grey pictures everywhere.
And now, the rise of the kerbal shadow society has begun! The shadowy figures of kerbals began to take over the forum...
